conversion_verification.notes: The 3D model presents a true volumetric reconstruction of the architectural plan with appropriate height and isometric perspective.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D depth and wall thickness. Geometry is clean and logically handled.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High layout fidelity. The complex hallway/bathroom core and diagonal wall segments are accurately preserved.

interior_elements.notes: Kitchen island, utility room appliances, and bathroom fixtures are correctly localized and scaled.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering; consistent lighting and material application.

detected_errors.description: Minor omission of specific door swing directions in secondary bedrooms.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that maintains complex interior geometry and room relationships with high precision.
